Web GUI

The WiReSens Toolkit Web GUI serves as a control panel for configuring devices, wireless data transmission, and visualization. It provides plug-and-play infrastructure for working with the WiReSens Toolkit.

It can be used from the deployed site: https://wi-re-sens-web.vercel.app/

Or can be setup locally for use in environments without internet access: Source Code. The instructions for local setup are below.

Introduction

Make sure you have Node and npm installed.

You can check by running node -v and npm -v from the terminal.

Getting Started

First, install the dependencies:

npm install
# or
yarn
# or
pnpm install

Then, run the development server:

npm run next-dev

Open http://localhost:3000 with your browser to see the result.

This deploys WiReSensWeb locally and listens for the WiReSensBackend (Python) running on your machine.
